snippet: The boxing champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. was released from a Las Vegas jail after serving two months of a 90-day sentence for domestic violence, the police said.
abstract: Boxing champion Floyd Mayweather Jr is released from a Las Vegas jail after serving two months of a 90-day sentence for domestic violence.
lead_paragraph: The boxing champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. was released from a Las Vegas jail after serving two months of a 90-day sentence for domestic violence, the police said.
